name: raddict
description: Raddict | A Simple Thought Sharing Platfom Among Developers

scripts.start: cross-env DEBUG=raddict:* USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333 RADDICT_MODEL=sequelize SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/sequelize-sqlite.yaml node --experimental-modules app.mjs
scripts.start-memory: cross-env DEBUG=raddict:* USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333 RADDICT_MODEL=memory node --experimental-modules app.mjs
scripts.start-fs: cross-env DEBUG=raddict:* USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333 RADDICT_MODEL=fs node --experimental-modules app.mjs
scripts.start-level: cross-env DEBUG=raddict:* USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333 RADDICT_MODEL=level node --experimental-modules app.mjs
scripts.start-sqlite3: cross-env DEBUG=raddict:* USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333 RADDICT_MODEL=sqlite3 node --experimental-modules app.mjs
scripts.start-sequelize: cross-env DEBUG=raddict:* USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333 RADDICT_MODEL=sequelize SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/sequelize-sqlite.yaml node --experimental-modules app.mjs
scripts.start-mongodb: cross-env DEBUG=raddict:* USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333 RADDICT_MODEL=mongodb MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost/ MONGO_DBNAME=post-mongodb node --experimental-modules app.mjs
scripts.server-leve1: cross-env DEBUG=raddict:* USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333 RADDICT_MODEL=fs PORT=3001 node --experimental-modules app.mjs
scripts.server-level2: cross-env DEBUG=raddict:* USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333 RADDICT_MODEL=fs PORT=3002 node --experimental-modules app.mjs
scripts.server-sqlite1: cross-env DEBUG=raddict:* USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333 RADDICT_MODEL=sqlite3 PORT=3001 node --experimental-modules app.mjs
scripts.server-sqlite2: cross-env DEBUG=raddict:* USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333 RADDICT_MODEL=sqlite3 PORT=3002 node --experimental-modules app.mjs
scripts.server-sequelize1: cross-env DEBUG=raddict:* USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333 SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/sequelize-sqlite.yaml PORT=3001 RADDICT_MODEL=sequelize node --experimental-modules app.mjs
scripts.server-sequelize2: cross-env DEBUG=raddict:* USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333 SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/sequelize-sqlite.yaml PORT=3002 RADDICT_MODEL=sequelize node --experimental-modules app.mjs
scripts.server-mongodb1: cross-env DEBUG=raddict:* USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333 RADDICT_MODEL=mongodb PORT=3001 MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost/ MONGO_DBNAME=post-mongodb node --experimental-modules app.mjs
scripts.server-mongodb2: cross-env DEBUG=raddict:* USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333 RADDICT_MODEL=mongodb PORT=3002 MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost/ MONGO_DBNAME=post-mongodb node --experimental-modules app.mjs
